peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I get old jewellery valued?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The NAJ's Institute of Registered Valuers (IRV) is the 'go to' appraisal body to find out how much your jewellery, watch or silverware is worth. All IRVs abide by the NAJ's Principles of Best Practice for Valuers.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I find the appraised value of my jewelry?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Look for on-site expert gemologists and appraisers that will identify your gemstones and determine values for insurance purposes, estate tax evaluation, value comparison and more. Many Jewelers of America Members offer appraisal services on- or off-site.
